revision.text:
{{ZScriptNote}} __NOTOC__
bool '''HitFloor'''()
== Usage == Responsible for spawning water splashes when an Actor hits liquid terrain. This accounts for both regular and 3D sectors, but only if the top of a 3D sector is hit.
=== Return value === Returns true if the Actor hit the floor of a sector defined as liquid.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]]
